data.title: Drooble
data.meta_description: Imagine a place where musicians grow by helping each other. A place that provides them with real opportunities to get their music heard and appreciated. A place where artists feel at home.
data.text:
Jussara Shamanaad

Jussara's Bio

Jussara is a yoga instructor and world music artist. She performs and composes traditional and original devotional songs. An indegenous Brazilian, Jussara's tribal and afro roots inspire her music. Her material includes New-age, Mantras, Bossa-nova, Reggae and world beat fusion music. She is devoted to Divine Mother Earth. Her passions include nature, animals, sacred sound (Naad) and helping people. This is the goal of my life and music. Each one of us has our different key and naad. just keep singing from the heart and feel good. This is the goal of my life and my music.
